description: Automates the creation of bills on QuickBooks Online from form submissions on the Hack the Hill reimbursement form. The project uses Google Apps Script for initial form processing and Cloudflare Workers for handling signature verification and finalization of reimbursements, protected with Cloudflare Zero Trust Access.
